The Public Relations Committee of NAEB is attempting to develop and
publish a ’’Personnel Resource Guide" to provide members, educators, and
laymen with a source of information concerning people available to assist
in the development of educational television.
The "Guide" is not to be exclusively a speaker's guide. It will Include
names of resource people who can serve as consultants, evaluators, and specialists,
as well. The "Guide" is not to be exclusively a source for free assistance.
Where expenses and/or honoraria are required, the "Guide" will so indicate.
To locate outstanding professional resource personnel for educational
television, the Committee is asking you to submit the names of persons you
recommend. Please indicate the topic area or areas in which you feel they
can best serve. Nominations must be received before
It is the hope of the Committee that this valuable resource information
will be available to you in the near future.
